Site Colophon

This site was built in Los Angeles with open-source tools including:

  • font
    Exo2.0 by Nathanael Gama and shared by Smashing Magazine. Hosted by Google fonts. Exo 2.0
  • background
    GPlay by Dimitrie Hoekstra. http://subtlepatterns.com/gplay/
  • glyphicons
    Font Awesome http://fontawesome.io
  • javascript
    jQuery http://jquery.com
  • editor
    Brackets http://brackets.io

Source is available on github and is licensed under the GNU General Public License
